Package org.openhab.core.automation.util

Class ConfigurationNormalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhab.core.automation.util.ConfigurationNormalizer
  • public class ConfigurationNormalizer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides utility methods used by RuleRegistry to resolve and normalize the RuleImpls configuration values.
    Author:
    Ana Dimova - Initial contribution

      ConfigurationNormalizer()

    • Method Detail

      • normalizeModuleConfigurations

        public static <T extends Module> void normalizeModuleConfigurations​(java.util.List<T> modules,
                                                                    ModuleTypeRegistry mtRegistry)
        Normalizes the configurations of the provided ModuleImpls.
        Parameters:
        modules - a list of ModuleImpls to normalize.
        mtRegistry - the ModuleTypeRegistry that provides the meta-data needed for the normalization.
        See Also:
        normalizeConfiguration(Configuration, Map)

      • getConfigDescriptionMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​ConfigDescriptionParameter> getConfigDescriptionMap​(java.util.List<ConfigDescriptionParameter> configDesc)
        Converts a list of ConfigDescriptionParameters to a map with the parameter's names as keys.
        Parameters:
        configDesc - the list to convert.
        Returns:
        a map that maps parameter names to ConfigDescriptionParameter instances.

      • normalizeConfiguration

        public static void normalizeConfiguration​(Configuration configuration,
                                          java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​ConfigDescriptionParameter> configDescriptionMap)
        Normalizes the types of the configuration's parameters to the allowed ones. References are ignored. Null values are replaced with the defaults and then normalized.
        Parameters:
        configuration - the configuration to normalize.
        configDescriptionMap - the meta-data of the configuration.
